definitions.definition: A beverage made by infusing the beans of the coffee plant in hot water.
examples: He and his friends used to order coffee whenever they went out.

definitions.definition: The seeds of the plant used to make coffee, called ‘ beans ’ due to their shape.
The powder made by roasting and grinding the seeds.
A tropical plant of the genus Coffea .
A pale brown color, like that of milk coffee.
The end of a meal, when coffee is served.
examples: He did not stay for coffee .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A beverage made by infusing the beans of the coffee plant in hot water.
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) A serving of this beverage.
The seeds of the plant used to make coffee, called ‘ beans ’ due to their shape.
The powder made by roasting and grinding the seeds.
A tropical plant of the genus Coffea .
A pale brown color, like that of milk coffee.
The end of a meal, when coffee is served.
